name: Thetwoofus
description:
Controls: A D or arrow keys

press number 2 to jump

The story: 2 people love each other and married. When they married they became 2 in 1. But then the wife disappeared and the 1 (the wife and the husband) were separated in (2). The husband is on a mission to save his wife and he has 2 lives, 2 minutes and he can only jump with the number 2.

 

The relevance to the theme: It’s about 1 who became 2 after being separated. 2 stands for love and faith and that’s what the husband is doing and is going for. He has also 2 minutes to save her and 2 lives in total. So he has to be quick and careful (Also 2 😊) to save his wife.

 

Some references:

Heart: https://opengameart.org/content/heart-1616

Credits: NicoleMarieProductions.

Girl: https://opengameart.org/content/customizable-character-pack

Main sound: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DzYp5uqixz0&list=PLfP6i5T0-DkIkXUym_3Be2Z8IENeuOqyk&index=3&t=0s

No copyrighted music.
